sentence.Network_en: The detainee who helped piece this together says the plot also targeted Britain.
sentence.Network_cn: 被捕者曾供出他们的目标是英国.

sentence.Network_en: The compact is issued to each detainee on arrival to the Centre.
sentence.Network_cn: 此协定在被拘留人来到本中心的时候会发给每个人.

sentence.Network_en: During the time of detention the detainee's food costs shall be paid by himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 在拘留期间,被拘留人的伙食费由自己负担.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...5号“中国移民议案“，在议案中，联邦政府要求太平洋铁路公司警察监管中国劳工，而在当时中国劳工被称作“被拘留者（detainee）“，他们像犯人一样遭受压迫，每天饥不果腹，超极限的工作。
detained pending investigation 扣留待查detainee 被扣留人detainer 扣押者
detain 羁留；拘留detainee 被羁留者detainee number 羁留编号
2011年1月26日 - embassies in Africa in 1998, is the first former Guantanamo Bay detainee(未判决囚犯) to be tried on terror charges in civilian court.

list.abs: BBC News with Jonathan Izzard . a detainee at Guantanamo Bay has been moved to New York where he will become the first Guantanamo prisoner to face justice a civil court in the United States .关塔纳摩监狱一名囚犯被转移到纽约，他将成为第一个在美国民事法庭接受审判的关塔纳摩囚犯。

these five detainees could face the death penalty if they are convicted , but if any of them acquitted he could still be kept in custody as an enemy combatant .假如被判定有罪的话，以上五名嫌疑人有可能会被判处死刑。假如他们其中哪一位被判无罪的话，他仍有可能作为敌方战斗人员被继续拘留下去。
detainee 被羁留者detainee number 羁留编号detainee's property book 被羁留者的财物登记册.
he aligned himself with the Democrats , at least those in Congress who opposed transferring the detainees to the mainland .他和那些民主党成员站在一方，至少是那些国会中反对将囚犯移至美国本土的成员。

entry.tran: (因其政治观点或活动而)被拘留者，被扣押者
entry.def: A detainee is someone who is held prisoner by a government because of his or her political views or activities.
